info.description: This is an official Golang API documentation for NovaApp.
info.title: Golang API

get.description: Get a paginated list of activity logs

post.description: Change user password with current password and new password
Login with email and password to receive a personal access token
Logout user and revoke current access token

put.description: Update user profile with name and email

get.description: Validate the personal access token and return user information
Get list of files for a specific file download by UID
get.summary: Get files by file download UID

put.description: Update user notification allowance and Expo push token

get.description: Get a paginated list of payment accounts
Get a list of payment goals for the authenticated user
Get overview statistics of payment goals for the authenticated user
Get detailed information about a specific payment goal
Get a paginated list of payments with optional filters

parameters.description: Type ID (1: Expense, 2: Income, 3: Transfer, 4: Withdrawal)
parameters.name: type

get.description: Get summary of payments within a date range
Get detailed information about a specific payment
Get a list of attachments for a specific payment
Get a paginated list of users
Get detailed information about a specific user

BearerAuth.description: Enter the token with the `Bearer ` prefix, e.g. "Bearer abcde12345"
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
